title: Big Ben Watch Face
summary: Big Ben, London's famous clock tower. Now a watch face for Android Wear
description: The Elizabeth Tower at the Palace of Westminster is world famous by its nickname "Big Ben". The clock is an icon of London and the United Kingdom as it stands above the British seat of government, the Houses of Parliament.Now you can wear it on your wrist in the form of an Android Wear watch face.App written by Jim Blacker. Original photography by Flickr user aldaron, licensed under Creative Commons CC BY-SA 2.0. Digitally modified images by Jim Blackler, under the same license.
descriptionHTML:
The Elizabeth Tower at the Palace of Westminster is world famous by its nickname "Big Ben". The clock is an icon of London and the United Kingdom as it stands above the British seat of government, the Houses of Parliament.

Now you can wear it on your wrist in the form of an Android Wear watch face.


App written by Jim Blacker. Original photography by Flickr user aldaron, licensed under Creative Commons CC BY-SA 2.0. Digitally modified images by Jim Blackler, under the same license.
comments: I cant find it because I'm stupid. Stupid people like me have not been catered for. I assume I need some kind of android watch to make it appear. Because it sure doesn't  show up on my Galaxy.  There should be a sign for fools and idiots such as me to explain this otherwise we are confused for anywhere up to an hour.

World famous clock face on your wrist! I like this, it's a nice replication of the clock face on London's famous tower. My only gripe is it is a little feint in dimmed mode on my Sony Smartwatch 3. Otherwise it would be 5 stars from me!
Jolly good job From a distance, where you can't tell it's Big Ben, it's just an awesome looking,  handsome watch fac
cool nicely done. Now you need the chimes.
Doesn't have enough information about the how to use the clock.
